thread.title: Great Hotel 100% recommendation
thread.title_full: Great Hotel 100% recommendation - Review of Holiday Inn Paris - Notre Dame, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Karen M
title: Great Hotel 100% recommendation
text:
Great Hotel. Good value for money. We had rooms 508 and 509. Double and twin in the rooms. great big showers. Beauiful decor. View of rooftops. Staff were excellent. lobby area is nice. Location couldn't be better, very close to RER St Michel Notre Dame which brings you direct to Airport.
Room Tip: Book direct with the hotel for best price and best room See more room tips
